item.title: Stocks Buckle Under Trump Tariffs; Amazon Slumps: Markets Wrap

item.title: Vale’s Iron Ore Output Edges Up on Amazon Mine Performance
item.description: Brazil’s Vale SA iron ore production in the second quarter beat estimates driven by an output record on its biggest mine in Brazil.

item.title: Amazon Makes Its First Public Sale | On This Day
item.description: Amazon made its first public sale 30 years ago July 16, 1995 and Romaine Bostick explains that first sale and how the company expanded into one of the world’s biggest companies. (Source: Bloomberg)
